snippet: An interest in sex, from the 1960s and ’70s, has its moment in this show of publishing and art at Susan Inglett Gallery.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibition of printed material from the late 1960s and early 1970s, organized by David Platzker, at Susan Inglett Gallery.
lead_paragraph: An interest in sex, from the 1960s and ’70s, has its moment in this show of publishing and art at Susan Inglett Gallery.
